link.title: Home
link.script:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: This Foundation has amassed in excess of $115,000.00 and granted in excess of $20,000.00 while maintaining investment growth. Learn more about how to apply for financial support and how to donate within. Go to “About” or “Contact Us” tabs above.

In order to increase our financial strength and amount of money we may Grant annually we have several ongoing projects. Our NEW fundraising and even more importantly community service effort is the Alumni Directory. Search under Projects and Directory for details

ul.li:
Directory, this is a unique Alumni phone/information book. Like a phone book it will include your contact information. Only public domain information is used and only with your permission.
Be sure to contact the phone number on the post card you receive from PCI. This is not a scam but your opportunity to verify information and authorize the use of other information. (Projects and Directory for details)
Memory Walk, There are still a few 24” x 24” and 12” x 12” available. Go to the Projects, Memory Walk tab above for more information.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Questions? Comments? Contact the Webmaster | © 2018 Covington Alumni Foundation / Covington Education Foundation
